fields.description:
Hi ,

Please look at the below forum question  from here 
http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/179675/use-addr2line-tool-from-ndk-stack-trace
and let me know the solution for it, 

I just want to use the NDK trace to identify the error which is causing an error
fields.summary: Use Addr2Line Tool from NDK Stack trace

comments.body:
If you want to learn more on how to use add2line, please check:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5314036/how-to-use-addr2line-in-android

and the Android docs.
